chess.FileRank

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FileRank EnPassant.getDoublePushedPawnLoc()
      Get the FileRank location of the pawn that just made a double push movement.
      FileRank Piece.getFileRank()
      Get the current location of this piece in the FileRank format.
      FileRank Piece.getRookLongCastleLoc()
      Get the location of the square where the rook will land when castling on the long side
      FileRank Piece.getRookShortCastleLoc()
      Get the location of the square where the rook will land when castling on the short side
      FileRank EnPassant.getTriggerLoc()
      Get the En Passant trigger location.
